title: progress
content: # `fastmcp.client.progress` ## Functions ### `default_progress_handler` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} default_progress_handler(progress: float, total: float | None, message: str | None) -> None ``` Default handler for progress notifications. Logs progress updates at debug level, properly handling missing total or message values. **Args:** * `progress`: Current progress value * `total`: Optional total expected value * `message`: Optional status message
